title: Ep89: Battle of Thiepval 1916
itunes:title: Ep89: Battle of Thiepval 1916
itunes:subtitle: Pete and Gary explore the Battle of Thiepval, one of the bloodiest chapters in the Battle of the Somme. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history content, visit  or subscribe to our...
description:
Pete and Gary explore the Battle of Thiepval, one of the bloodiest chapters in the Battle of the Somme.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.
